alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Little River; Miller; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:34PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Little River, southwestern Hempstead, northern Miller, Lafayette, southeastern Howard, southwestern Nevada and Columbia Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 634 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ogden to Taylor. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Magnolia, Hope, Ashdown, Stamps, Waldo, Lewisville, McNeil, Taylor, Emerson, Buckner, Garland, Tollette, Fulton, Ogden, Washington, Bussey, Smithland, Saratoga and Macedonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Hempstead; Howard; Lafayette; Little River; Miller; Nevada
